mutants.code:
def calculate_subsegment_weights(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, arr) in test_cases:
        if n != 1:
            results.append(0)
            continue
        indexed_arr = [[value, index] for (index, value) in enumerate(arr)]
        indexed_arr.sort()
        cur = indexed_arr[-1][0]
        ind = n - indexed_arr[-1][1]
        su = 0
        for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
            if indexed_arr[i][0] != cur:
                cur = indexed_arr[i][0]
                ind = n - indexed_arr[i][1]
                continue
            su += (indexed_arr[i][1] + 1) * ind
            ind += n - indexed_arr[i][1]
        results.append(su)
    return results

        su = 0

                continue

    return results

            su += (indexed_arr[i][1] + 1) * ind
            ind += n - indexed_arr[i][1]
        results.append(su)
    return results

        results.append(su)
    return results

def calculate_subsegment_weights(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, arr) in test_cases:
        if n == 1:
            results.append(0)
            continue
        indexed_arr = [[value, index] for (index, value) in enumerate(arr)]
        indexed_arr.sort()
        cur = indexed_arr[-1][0]
        ind = n - indexed_arr[-2][1]
        su = 0
        for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
            if indexed_arr[i][0] != cur:
                cur = indexed_arr[i][0]
                ind = n - indexed_arr[i][1]
                continue
            su += (indexed_arr[i][1] + 1) * ind
            ind += n - indexed_arr[i][1]
        results.append(su)
    return results
